mapper.select: SELECT d.id, p.description AS product_description, d.opening_hours, d.place_name, d.place_street, f.save_file_name AS product_image FROM display_info AS d INNER JOIN product AS p ON d.product_id = p.id INNER JOIN product_image AS pi ON d.product_id = pi.product_id AND pi.type = 'th' INNER JOIN file_info AS f ON pi.file_id = f.id WHERE d.id = #{displayInfoId}
